message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6000, you take $4000.  Think about the inflation!
I think we can do better than that, Alice! Considering the inflation, my offer is quite generous.
Don't be greedy, Bob. This offer is my last compromise. The clock is ticking and inflation is eating our money!
I'm willing to take a bigger share, since my money isn't losing value. You should consider accepting before the inflation gets worse for you!
